title: A MaryGirl Christmas Special
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: OMG I totally remember that episode of Tales from the Crypt when it aired.  I wanna say around '89, cuz I was a Freshman in Highschool.  Jesus, that was ages ago!!😄
Happy Christmas Mary :* Spending it with my Boyfriends family x
description:
Talking with you and taking your holiday questions. Also, I want to know what you're doing for Christmas or what holiday you celebrate. Toss out that nasty eggnog and settle down for my Christmas special. 

Check out my horror novels and scary shorts at www.maryannmoody.us

Enjoy and don't forget to LIKE and SUBSCRIBE!
